languages.text: "Скверно, но куда менее скверно, чем могло бы быть, благодаря паранойе и невыносимому характеру Леди Зауэрбэк. Как вам хорошо известно, сия особа обладает прескверной особенностью ждать предательства от кого угодно... кроме Вашей Светлости, конечно. Посему она позаботилась составить особые протоколы на случаи самых разных сценариев мятежей на борту, а также нашпиговала своими агентами каждую палубу".

"Quite bad, but it could have been far worse if it were not for Mistress Sauerback's paranoia and insufferable temper. As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and had stationed agents on every deck."
languages.original_text: "Скверно, но куда менее скверно, чем могло бы быть, благодаря паранойе и невыносимому характеру Леди Зауэрбэк. Как вам хорошо известно, сия особа обладает прескверной особенностью ждать предательства от кого угодно... кроме Вашей Светлости, конечно. Посему она позаботилась составить особые протоколы на случаи самых разных сценариев мятежей на борту, а также нашпиговала своими агентами каждую палубу".

As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and stationed agents on every deck."

languages.text: «En una bastante mala, pero, de no ser por la paranoia y actitud insufrible de la maestra Sauerback, estaríamos peor. Como bien sabe, tiene la fea costumbre de esperar una traición de todos excepto mi{mf|lord|lady}. Por tanto, se aseguró de preparar protocolos especiales para todo tipo de motines, y tenía agentes estacionados en cada cubierta».
languages.original_text: "Quite bad, but it could have been far worse if it were not for Mistress Sauerback's paranoia and insufferable temper. As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and had stationed agents on every deck."

traits.locale_text: «En una bastante mala, pero, de no ser por la paranoia y actitud insufrible de la maestra Sauerback, estaríamos peor. Como bien sabe, tiene la fea costumbre de esperar una traición de todos excepto mi{mf|lord|lady}. Por tanto, se aseguró de preparar protocolos especiales para todo tipo de motines, y tenía agentes estacionados en cada cubierta».

languages.text: 「ひどい有様です。しかし、ザウアーバック氏の被害妄想と短期がなければ、もっとひどいことになっていたかもしれません。ご承知のように、彼女は陛下以外の誰もが裏切ると思い込む嫌な癖があります。だからあの人は、あらゆる反乱を想定した特別なプロトコルを作成し、各デッキに諜報員を配置していたのです」
languages.original_text: "Quite bad, but it could have been far worse if it were not for Mistress Sauerback's paranoia and insufferable temper. As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and had stationed agents on every deck."

traits.locale_text: 「ひどい有様です。しかし、ザウアーバック氏の被害妄想と短期がなければ、もっとひどいことになっていたかもしれません。ご承知のように、彼女は陛下以外の誰もが裏切ると思い込む嫌な癖があります。だからあの人は、あらゆる反乱を想定した特別なプロトコルを作成し、各デッキに諜報員を配置していたのです」

languages.text: “相当糟糕。不过，要不是因为苏尔贝克女士偏执的性格和令人难以忍受的臭脾气，现在的情况很可能会糟糕得多。您很清楚，她有个坏习惯，那就是坚信除了您之外所有人都可能会背叛她，所以她早就制定好了叛乱爆发期间的行事守则，还在每层甲板上都安插了她的特工。”
languages.original_text: "Quite bad, but it could have been far worse if it were not for Mistress Sauerback's paranoia and insufferable temper. As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and had stationed agents on every deck."

traits.locale_text: “相当糟糕。不过，要不是因为苏尔贝克女士偏执的性格和令人难以忍受的臭脾气，现在的情况很可能会糟糕得多。您很清楚，她有个坏习惯，那就是坚信除了您之外所有人都可能会背叛她，所以她早就制定好了叛乱爆发期间的行事守则，还在每层甲板上都安插了她的特工。”

languages.text: "Nicht gut, doch ohne Herrin Sauerbacks Paranoia und unerträgliches Temperament hätte es noch viel schlimmer kommen können. Wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst, hat sie die unschöne Angewohnheit, von jedem mit Ausnahme Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} einen Verrat zu erwarten. Sie hatte daher spezielle Protokolle für allerlei verschiedene Varianten einer Meuterei vorbereitet und Agenten auf allen Decks postiert."
languages.original_text: "Quite bad, but it could have been far worse if it were not for Mistress Sauerback's paranoia and insufferable temper. As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and had stationed agents on every deck."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht gut, doch ohne Herrin Sauerbacks Paranoia und unerträgliches Temperament hätte es noch viel schlimmer kommen können. Wie Ihr nur zu gut wisst, hat sie die unschöne Angewohnheit, von jedem mit Ausnahme Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} einen Verrat zu erwarten. Sie hatte daher spezielle Protokolle für allerlei verschiedene Varianten einer Meuterei vorbereitet und Agenten auf allen Decks postiert."

languages.text: « Assez mauvaise, mais sans la paranoïa de maîtresse Sauerback et, il faut le dire, son tempérament quelque peu insupportable, cela aurait pu être bien pire. Comme vous le savez, elle a la fâcheuse habitude de s'attendre à ce que tout le monde finisse par trahir, à l'exception de Votre Seigneurie, bien sûr. Elle avait donc pris soin de rédiger des protocoles spéciaux pour toutes sortes de mutineries et avait posté des agents sur chaque passerelle. »
languages.original_text: "Quite bad, but it could have been far worse if it were not for Mistress Sauerback's paranoia and insufferable temper. As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and had stationed agents on every deck."

traits.locale_text: « Assez mauvaise, mais sans la paranoïa de maîtresse Sauerback et, il faut le dire, son tempérament quelque peu insupportable, cela aurait pu être bien pire. Comme vous le savez, elle a la fâcheuse habitude de s'attendre à ce que tout le monde finisse par trahir, à l'exception de Votre Seigneurie, bien sûr. Elle avait donc pris soin de rédiger des protocoles spéciaux pour toutes sortes de mutineries et avait posté des agents sur chaque passerelle. »

languages.text: "Hayli kötü ama Sauerback Hanım'ın endişeleri ve katlanılmaz tavrı olmasa çok daha berbat olabilirdi. Bildiğiniz gibi zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri dışında herkesin ihanetine uğramayı bekler, öyle kötü bir huyu vardır. Bu yüzden envaiçeşit ayaklanmaya karşı özel protokoller hazırlayıp bütün güvertelere hizmetkârlarını yerleştirmiş."
languages.original_text: "Quite bad, but it could have been far worse if it were not for Mistress Sauerback's paranoia and insufferable temper. As you well know, she has a nasty habit of expecting betrayal from everyone except Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. She had therefore taken care to draw up special protocols for all sorts of mutiny, and had stationed agents on every deck."
